entities.name: bledore
entities.description: Bledore is mentioned as the one who rose to his feet at the staff table.

entities.name: staff table
entities.description: The staff table is where Bledore rose to his feet.

entities.name: quidditch field
entities.description: The Quidditch field is mentioned as the location for the third and final task of the Triwizard Tournament.

entities.name: triwizard tournament
entities.description: The Triwizard Tournament is an event where champions compete in tasks.

entities.name: mr. bagman
entities.description: Mr. Bagman is mentioned as the one who will lead the champions down to the stadium.

entities.name: great hall
entities.description: The Great Hall is a location where Harry and other characters are present.

entities.name: gryffindors
entities.description: Gryffindors are a group of students who are applauding Harry.

entities.name: weasleys
entities.description: The Weasleys are a family who wish Harry good luck.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the people who wishes Harry good luck.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is a champion who accompanies Harry down to the Quidditch field.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is a champion who accompanies Harry down to the Quidditch field.

entities.name: viktor
entities.description: Viktor is a champion who accompanies Harry down to the Quidditch field.

entities.name: stone steps
entities.description: The stone steps are mentioned as the path that Harry and others take down from the Great Hall.

relationships.description: Bledore is at the staff table.
The third and final task of the Triwizard Tournament will take place on the Quidditch field, which is related to Bledore.
Mr. Bagman is leading the champions down to the stadium.
The Weasleys wish Bledore good luck.
Cedric is accompanying Bledore down to the Quidditch field.
Fleur is accompanying Bledore down to the Quidditch field.
Viktor is accompanying Bledore down to the Quidditch field.
Bledore is at the stone steps.
The Great Hall is related to Bledore, as he rose from it.
